title: BRIEF-Dion Global Solutions Says Board Of Unit Dion Global Solutions (Singapore) Appointed Liquidators
text:
BRIEF-Dion Global Solutions Says Board Of Unit Dion Global Solutions (Singapore) Appointed Liquidators

Stock Markets 37 minutes ago (Oct 04, 2019 18:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Dion Global Solutions Says Board Of Unit Dion Global Solutions (Singapore) Appointed Liquidators Oct 4 (Reuters) - Dion Global Solutions Ltd : * BOARD OF UNIT DION GLOBAL SOLUTIONS (SINGAPORE) APPOINTED JOINT AND SEVERAL LIQUIDATORS FOR DION SINGAPORE
